website_summaries.verdict: You might not have an obvious need for an Internet-connected, color-changing light bulb, but the Philips Hue Connected Bulb kit offers enough potential to justify its high price tag.
pros: Philips' Hue Connected Bulb lets you change the color of your lightbulbs and control them from your phones
It's easy to use, and -- most importantly -- nails the basics
cons: Three-bulbs-and-a-hub is expensive at $199, the novelty factor will wear off for many users quickly, and Android users apparently come in second on Philips' app development priority list

customer_reviews.title: No problem adding to existing set up.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought the hue lux system and wanted to add color to my layout. Found this on Amazon for around 120. I had no problems adding these bulbs to my existing hue setup as stated in another review. All I did to add these bulbs in my current setup is add their serial numbers to the app during setup and it added them with no problems at all. My hue set up works very well with my Amazon Alexa (better than the apps themselves do) The lux bulbs are a bit brighter but if you want to add color this works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Man

customer_reviews.title: Great But Not Practical For Primary Lighting
customer_reviews.text: These really are cool. However I found that the "Reading" light setting was not as bright as I would have liked. The other colors are pretty fun to play with but not practical when you are using these for your primary lights. If you have excess lights around the house that you want to play with and have excess money to spend then I would get these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but the application needs a lot of work.
customer_reviews.text: First let me say, I do like this product. It's nice to be able to have lighting automated and the ability to remotely control them is a plus. I'm not sure I will use the color scenes very often. I probably should have saved a lot more money by purchasing the kit that only has white lights. What is such a downer is for the extremely high price you pay for this product, the application is one of the worst I've seen. It is cumbersome and not intuitive at all. There are no instructions for operating the software, other than to get the bridge and lights set up to be recognized by the bridge.
customer_reviews.author: Connie W

customer_reviews.title: Great LED lights!
customer_reviews.text: The HUE lighting system works great!! I've had other Wi-Fi enabled lights that didn't work all the time with the connections. These do! Playing with the colors is great, and now we have the option of running them through the Amazon Echo. They turn blue when it rains, go on and off with sunset and sunrise, and just work great. New programs are coming out all the time for them. They are pricey, but with the bulb life worth it. Very well made and reliable. You can also have a lot of fun playing around with the colors- orange at Halloween, red at Christmas, green st Pats day. Glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Looks good,  good app, but Internet and Alexa integrtation is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: These look very good in my living room, and I like how I can have them turn on in the morning and off after I leave for work, Better Alexa coordination (I cannot turn on scenes from Alexa) and scenes from the internet would be great. Cost is fairly prohibitive as well. I would recommend this for purchase with the above caveats.
customer_reviews.author: eclectic customer

customer_reviews.title: It's freaking awesome. I was a little hesitant because my original ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence about this product, just get it. It's freaking awesome. I was a little hesitant because my original lights have a dimmer and this product doesn't work with a dimmer switch. However, the apps allow you to dim the light bulb so problem solved. Also, depending on the type of color combination you choose, you might hear a slight buzzing noise emitting from the light bulbs. I thought this would drive me crazy, but honestly I don't notice it anymore. When I have guests, no one notices any noise either. I'm a yes for hue lights!
customer_reviews.author: NYC Runner

customer_reviews.title: Love Lights!
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to control the lighting in my living room with this kit. The kids love it when I change the color to match the video game level they're playing. I was concerned with this being an older version kit, but it performed and synced up with the app flawlessly. Already saving some pennies to buy more bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb P.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible luxury item for any home.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted these for an amazingly long time, and finally got them. They. Are. Flawless. I can't think of any way to complain about them. They might be a little too dim for some people at their brightest setting, but it doesn't bother me at all because I use all 3 in one room. The app might use some improvements, but there are alternative apps, and the official one is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sayer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great start to a pretty cool and easy to use tech. I bought three more bulbs and I'm planning on at least getting one more. Yes it's pricey, but you'll save substantially and they'll pay for themselves in short order, if your moving from incandescent bulbs. Why didn't I give it a five star? Well I guess because I have to buy a separate switch to turn on my lights should I not have my phone in my pocket or my Amazon Echo has a connectivity problem to the Hue bridge. But since everything programmed to come on when I actually need light it's only a minor inconvenience. I haven't purchased the separate remote switch yet but probably will soon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: This listing falsely advertises a 2nd generation bridge via its images. All images show a square bridge (2nd-3rd generation), but what you really receive is 1st generation bulbs and bridge. False Advertising.
customer_reviews.author: piksi

customer_reviews.title: Great technology, convenient.  Standardization needed for bulbs
customer_reviews.text: This works great, exactly as advertised. Set up was easy and quick. Biggest drawback overall is price of bulbs and non-standardization of smart bulbs in general (reason for 4 stars instead of 5.) This will probably change as more users come on board with the technology. The alarm and geo-fencing capability is great. Holds up well in cold temperatures-have a bulb outside where it has been below zero, snow, wind, etc., and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Gives my bedroom new life now and the old app is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item used and it works great. Its not too bright nor not too dim it's perfect for a bedroom with all three lights connected. I do prefer the old app the new app of the Philip Hue is a bit confusing. Now my room has a different atmosphere with different color lights for the mood. I do recommend the older version if you dont want to pay double the amount for the latest version
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addon to the Amazon Echo
customer_reviews.text: Paired with the Amazon Echo this kit makes automated lighting quick and easy. You can do anything from change the brightness of the lights (all the bulbs or just one), the dimming feature, you can change the color of the lights. The bulbs look white however they can produce an entire rainbow of colors. You can also purchase wall plugs so you can control anything that plugs into a two pronged outlet.
customer_reviews.author: S. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Phillips Hue Starter Set Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The Phillips Hue LED lights and included bridge are working without any issues. It did take me a short amount of time to get them to work with Alexa, but you can just use a smart phone app to make your color adjustments and off/on choices. I specifically purchased them to use with Amazon's Alexa for voice control. Works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Patriot Aviator

customer_reviews.title: The lights are really nice. Colors are nice and vibrant
customer_reviews.text: The lights are really nice. Colors are nice and vibrant, save for green. The green in still green, but it's not as vibrant as a blue or purple. Connecting to the bridge is really easy, just bake sure that it is within range of an ethernet connection and is nice that one bridge can control 50 lights. The stock app is also nice but the lights really come alive with third party apps like IFTTT and OnSwitch
customer_reviews.author: Caleb N

customer_reviews.title: I know they are expensive but if you have an ...
customer_reviews.text: I know they are expensive but if you have an Amazon echo these are the ultimate accessory. Walk in room, Alexa, lights on. "OK" lights come on. Then just use the app to set your mood or leave them as they are. Walking out of the room. Alexa, lights off. "OK" Lights go out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Smart Home Light Package
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for starting out your Smart Home. Great kit with the Hub and 3 dimming and colour changing LED Bulbs. Quite bright at full brightness and great atmosphere with things like the Syfy Sync App which adjusts lights and colous with scenes during the show.
customer_reviews.author: Zer0 Divide

customer_reviews.title: Love my Hue setup, but drop the price already
customer_reviews.text: These lights work great with my Echo and Dot setups at home, an unlimited supply of moods at your fingertips (or vocal cords) Ive had mine for just over 6 months, but its a hefty price to pay for just a couple lights.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Traurig

customer_reviews.title: MARRY ME HUE?
customer_reviews.text: Our home is now a "friend of Hue!" I try not to bother my boyfriend about "gimme gimme," but for Hue I did. Turns out he enjoys it equally. We love all things that are "tech sexy" and Hue fits the bill. We don't actually need additional bulbs to benefit from this, we are a one bedroom apartment, but know we will order different styles, etc. Fully addicted. Happily Hue-d!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Funny with Lights
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty much as advertised plus there are several third party apps that provide for an entertaining light show.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but certainly don't have buyers remorse.
customer_reviews.text: Certain color reproduction is quite frankly terrible and brightness could be better. Even with these issue I love these lights and very happy to have them. If you're on the fence and you have the money go for it. They work great with Echo.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Halterman

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. So what if its the "old" style? Saved a bundle and I can always upgrade later if I'm feeling left out of the cool kid gang
customer_reviews.author: Psychout3000

customer_reviews.title: Life changer ♥
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs will change your life! Seriously! They were worth every penny to us. We change the color all the time to fit our mood and have figured out how to use them with Amazon Alexa. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus McGee

customer_reviews.title: Simplify your life
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend who is into computers and programming and he set up the lights with amazon alexa and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lights are great. After you have some you want every light ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. After you have some you want every light in your house to be a HUE bulb
customer_reviews.author: BEDOLLA , Robert

customer_reviews.title: I needed these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment. I love being able to control my lights from and app. The app itself need improvement but over all it's a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Janine K.

customer_reviews.title: and the Philips app is not the best. You'll want to look into third party applications ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed. It's just seems a bit pricey, and the Philips app is not the best. You'll want to look into third party applications for controlling anything other than scheduled color changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how bright and vidid the colors are and how easy it was to sync with my Echo.
customer_reviews.author: David F

customer_reviews.title: Turn your blah home cool...and save money
customer_reviews.text: My first package arrived with a broke and missing light...but they sent a replacement quickly. Love the party app to make the lights dance. This also connects effortless with the Cree lights...can't wait for my echo to get here to really have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great to have - great to give
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and it has become my go-to housewarming present. So cool to be able to change the mood in a room w/ the App.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn E. Haaga

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Work great and lots of fun. Some of the 3rd party apps are a little glitchy but the lights themselves are great. If they were cheaper I would replace every bulb in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stan

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: The most awesome and custom light set I have ever used. If you want control over and to direct the quality of your light - get this.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Great for setting any mood
customer_reviews.text: These really liven up any room. Great for setting any mood, and enhancing your music experience.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize this was original bridge (round) Now have to save for square bridge and a bunch more bulbs. All on purple last nite in honor of Prince
customer_reviews.author: tbb

customer_reviews.title: Life-Changing
customer_reviews.text: These lights have seriously changed my life! I've had them for about a year and am always finding new functions. The Hue app gets better by the day and more bulb style keep coming...bring the Ambilight tv system to the U.S. and then we'll really see what these can do! I'm also excited for my Amazon Echo to arrive so I can control my lights without lifting a finger!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Peter Wood

customer_reviews.title: I just love these because they can definitely set the mood
customer_reviews.text: I just love these because they can definitely set the mood. They are easy to install, just follow the instructions in the app.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Mother loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother, they where not hard for her to set up and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: The green is rather weak but the white, off white, purple and blue are great. The app works pretty well, I just wish you could use a PC.
customer_reviews.author: TheHiggs

customer_reviews.title: Great mood lighting
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Use them all the time in my bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Kim R Fajardro

customer_reviews.title: A must have light bulbs for any home
customer_reviews.text: Great value, for the price. A must have light bulbs for any home, versatile and convenient
customer_reviews.author: ABADON

customer_reviews.title: One of the bulbs won't connect
customer_reviews.text: One of the three bulbs won't connect. Other than that great lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jake R.

customer_reviews.title: a recommended product for the home  its fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the hue light system so impressed that im buying more light bulbs to complete my home..thanks and happy holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Nino Cartier

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the hue lighting system you can set the mood ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the hue lighting system you can set the mood to any room you want I just purchased the bloom friends of hue very easy to bridge the lights together
customer_reviews.author: Gmtech47

customer_reviews.title: Transformative lighting
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and easy use. It changes the way you think about lighting in your home. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brit-NYC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing, I'm thrilled with this product
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Absolutely amazing!! This is honestly one of the coolest and most fun things I have ever purchased. Setup was a breeze and the app took a few minutes to get my head around (it's very intuitive, just dive in!)... now I am bathing my living space in fantastic colors that all fade and merge... and it's making me absurdly happy. I can't wait to surprise my friends. Invite them round with all the lights set to 'normal' and act as if nothing, and then at a certain point I will have the phone behind my back and with a gesture of the other hand, turn the room into a "Neptune's Lair" of deep blues and reds... :D
customer_reviews.author: A. Newman

customer_reviews.title: IOS free app is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: E X C E L L E N T product , I use it daily. IOS free app is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: I would have given this 5 stars before, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars before, but a recent firmware update has blocked pairing of third party (GE Link, Osram, etc) bulbs, even though they worked in the past. This was done without notice, so people's lights suddenly stopped working if they attempted to re-pair them or reset their hub. What are you afraid of, Philips? edit: Philips has reversed their decision and I have amended my review.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like color. It make the. House more like a home. It sets mood for any occation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and great to give a different look to you home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great great piece of innovation
customer_reviews.text: Great great piece of innovation. Just love it. Green color isn't that good but other then that it's AWESOME
customer_reviews.author: ismail didi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Combining this with the Amazon Echo makes for the beginning of my home automation project. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Wood

customer_reviews.title: Just what my man cave needed!
customer_reviews.text: Simple plug and play lighting solution. Brilliant colors and a ton of fun.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An expensive toy really but it works great and the possibilities are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up. works great!
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up, and they are fun o use!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harmon

customer_reviews.title: There is a new version out.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product! 3 stars because you need to purchase an updated Hue Bridge if you want home automation using a device like Amazon Eco. The lights work great though with IPhone app. Super cool product. Lights don't keep last color used if you turn of the light of manually by either switch or pull string. They will defult to white when to turn them back on. They only keep the color when you turn off using IPhone app.
customer_reviews.author: Keebler

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. The meethue. com site should ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The meethue.com site should allow you to edit the scenes but it does not, only the mobile app does.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best product ever. Now I am fan of HUE !!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Campos González

customer_reviews.title: Philips Hue Connected Bulb Starter Pack
customer_reviews.text: OMG these are amazing - we are totally in awe with these lights and change the mood setting each night. Or if we are not at home we can turn on the lights from our I-phones before entering the house, totally COOL!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Foggy Petition

customer_reviews.title: Was Great
customer_reviews.text: Software update removed support for compatible (ZLL) bulbs without warning. Wouldn't trust this manufacturer not to remove other popular features on a whim.
customer_reviews.author: waffles

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start up with Alexa and my Kindle, I plan on getting more Hue bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Alexa, Philips, and me, we got a thing going on and it's so fun! It was super simple to get going with Alexa and my Kindle. I plan to put it on my phone I just haven't got to it yet, but as simple as it was with the Echo I foresee no problems and I plan on getting more Hue bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Kat

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect until they blocked 3rd party bulbs with their most ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect until they blocked 3rd party bulbs with their most recent update. Given my situation this makes the product completely worthless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chazz Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use with Google Home and it works just fine. I love the level of light output and the responsive to my wifi was a breeze to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great for movie watching
customer_reviews.text: These things are so much fun. It's neat having colored lighting around the house. But, it's especially useful when you want low light when watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, no longer works with other devices
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed Hue for years until they recently updated it to break all backwards compatibility with other devices and bulbs. They openly promoted that it had support for Zigbee standard and worked with other devices then pulled the rug out from under customers making the hub useless. Do not buy! Buy a hub that will work with all of your smart home devices instead.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Boyda

customer_reviews.title: super awesome lights
customer_reviews.text: These are everything I wanted them to be. I bought them for my super techy husband and they were the perfect gift, a bit pricey but we can't wait to add to the bulbs
customer_reviews.author: COnukechick

customer_reviews.title: Gadgety junk
customer_reviews.text: Broke quickly, hard to use. The wink and leviton systems work far better.
customer_reviews.author: matthew s

customer_reviews.title: You should buy these!!
customer_reviews.text: Fiance LOVEs it!! We are now trying to convert the rest of the house to these light bulbs. Going to cost a fortune but it'll be worth it!! Love LED and colors. Total win win
customer_reviews.author: Philly Yunker

customer_reviews.title: Color is a easy way to change or improve your mood.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are freakn awesome! The possibilities are endless! Goes great with my Wink hub and Echo, works flawlessly together.
customer_reviews.author: TDub

customer_reviews.title: It works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son as a house gift. He loves it. It works fine.
customer_reviews.author: BiewerFever

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed by the colors
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind thise are great,but the first impression is that the colors are not that well defined(the look too much the same)..i got the first generation,so maybe the second one is more advanced
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: It does not work!! It's not connected to the light bulbs no matter how hard we tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Yang Liu

customer_reviews.title: Tech people, don't hesitate and buy them
customer_reviews.text: I now have a stylish sexy room with different color hues. I pick the colors based on day and night times. Turn lights when I'm outside my house. The bulbs have a very long life, I have about 10 of them in my house now and none has broken! Spending about 200$ on bulbs sounds a bit questioning but I'd say they are worth every penny. I recommend them for those who love to have fun in their rooms. Note: Those bulbs can function just like standard light bulbs in warm white light color. Wall switch to turn ON-OFF and you won't need the bridge that connects them to your electronic devices.
customer_reviews.author: Luay Y.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: one of the three bulb failed after 2 days. Also, the brightness when in color mode is very low.
customer_reviews.author: Amrit

customer_reviews.title: Warning - these are glass!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat jumped off the end table, knocked the lamp off the end table and the bulb shattered into a million pieces. Can you join with Corning and make them of Gorilla glass so they stand a chance? Was thinking a $50 bulb would be made of something more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Allegretto

customer_reviews.title: With an Improved App, it works very well
customer_reviews.text: Latest app in iOS 7 works very well now. Alarms and schedules all work. It doesn't self adjust for DST. User has to fiddle with each set alarm in order for the alarm schedule to work at the desired time. May be this is the developers' way of saying they didn't agree with the necessity of having DST so they wouldn't implement a feature that would compensate for the bi-annual US time change.
customer_reviews.author: Home E Tech

product_meta.title: Philips 426353 Hue White and Color Personal Wireless Lighting, Starter Pack, Retail Packing, 1st Gen
product_meta.description: Choose between millions of colors and shades of white light to light your home, wirelessly control with your smartphone or tablet, and sync your light immersively to music, games, and movies. Including the Philips Hue Bridge for the full Hue experience, these bulbs fit standard size table lamps. Install the LED lights as you would install ordinary bulbs and pair them with the Hue Bridge, which allows you to control smart bulb equipped lamps and overhead lights via the Philips Hue App. Easily expand your lighting system with accessories (sold separately), such as a Hue Dimmer Switch, Hue Tap, or Hue Motion Sensor. Pair it for automation with your existing Nest or SmartThings system. This box includes three Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance A19 standard light bulbs, a Hue Bridge with power adapter and ethernet cable, manual, and two year warranty.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (hub required and included, Alexa device sold separately)
Choose between millions of colors and shades of white light to light your home, wirelessly control with your smartphone or tablet, and sync your light immersively to music, games, and movies
Including the Philips Hue Bridge for the full Hue experience, these bulbs fit standard size table lamps
Install the LED lights as you would install ordinary bulbs and pair them with the Hue Bridge, which allows you to control smart bulb equipped lamps and overhead lights via the Philips Hue App
Easily expand your lighting system with accessories (sold separately), such as a Hue Dimmer Switch, Hue Tap, or Hue Motion Sensor; Pair it for automation with your existing Nest or SmartThings system
This box includes three Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance A19 standard light bulbs, a Hue Bridge with power adapter and ethernet cable, manual, and two year warranty
